Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2018 01:27PM - edited Apr 16, 2018 01:39PM by mdevroy I started my treatment April 12 I( have not had surgery yet. Started with Taxol once a week for 12 weeks along with Herceptin and Perjeta the last two are every 3 weeks. Went back to work today feeling ok just the bone and body pain. We will see what the next 11 weeks hold for me. I am going to try and work if I can. trying to stay positive. And praying for warm weather and sun

Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2018 02:44PM - edited Jun 19, 2018 02:50PM by mdevroy I have surgery July 26. Just went through 12 weeks of Paclitaxel. Not sure what kind of surgery yet I will find out on July 2 after the genetics testing and all the scans are in. If its a lumpectomy i will then go to 6 weeks of everyday radiation. After that every three weeks of herceptin till April 2019. I just want to get back to normal. So far i have been working full time think that will change after surgery. i just want to be back to my self again
